author: The Film Theorists
description:
*Check out Mint Mobile now & thank you for sponsoring today's video!* ► https://mintmobile.yt.link/Xf43O6U?qr=1

We grew up on Dreamworks movies, but do they all have more connections with each other than we thought? Join us for today’s episode as we make connections to some of your favorite Dreamworks films in ways you might never have imagined!
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
*Credits:*
Writers: Forrest Lee, Eric Naessig, Melissa Yinger
Editors: JayskiBean, Koen Verhagen, Gilberto "RetiredRinne" Dias, Danial "BanditRants" Keristoufi, Pedro Freitas
Sound Designer: Yosi Berman

title: Film Theory: The Dreamworks Theory
